comment.author: 28748166@N08
comment._content: Pentheny Building on King Street, Csted?

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: mangoesnjam: Thanks for the suggestion! It is King Street in Christiansted, but according to photographs in the Library of Congress' Historic American Buildings Survey Collection, the building in the center is the Drewes House. (See the record in our catalog here.) Pentheny Hotel is next door on King Street, out of frame to the left. We'll update the source data to reflect this and then reload the description in Flickr.

comment.author: 82441964@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Art is Art, and we'd love to have this added to the group! Composition, perspective, color: Art. Fave.
